content.question: After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the informal power being used by President Bush and explain how that power might impact the actions of the secretary of energy. In the context of the scenario, explain how the bureaucracy might hinder cooperation among the Department of Transportation, the Department of Energy, and the Environmental Protection Agency. Describe an action the legislative branch could take to affect how the bureaucracy is implementing President Bush’s order. Explain how partisanship in Congress could slow legislative action on the issue highlighted in the scenario.
